thread.section_title: TheaterSeat.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TheaterSeat.com | theaterseat.com
thread.title: Nick Jehle

author: Nick Jehle
title: Nick Jehle
text: This place was very professional. I went into to their showroom in La Habra so i could actually sit in the theater seats to see which ones were the most comfortable . As soon as we were buzzed in we were greeted by a sales rep named John Jasso. John showed us around and answered all of questions until we finally found the seats we wanted. As a salesman myself, I always look to the rep to point me in the right direction and John did just that. We bought 4 chairs to start and will keep coming back as we add onto our media room. John provided exceptional customer service and we are very happy with the products we bought.
